title: Reborn as the Spirit King - Novel Updates
tags: Elemental Magic   Male Protagonist   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Spirits   Summoning Magic   Time Skip   Transmigration
author: Yoon Shin Hyun   윤신현
description: When I awoke, I found myself in an unfamiliar world, having to adapt to it. However, this didn’t mean I couldn’t survive. Why? Because, the spirits seem to love me a lot.>
